section.p: As soon as you step into the hole, you feel strangely light-headed, as if you were in a dream. Nothing seems quite real. It is lit by a dull, reddish glow, although where the light is coming from you cannot tell. It is as if the very air were aglow. It smells damp, musty and spicy, all at once.
You proceed down a tunnel that slopes steeply downward into the bowels of the earth. It soon branches into a veritable maze of tunnels.
